messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Speaking in Florida
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 1/18/2004 10:50:00 PM Eastern Standard Time, ... Beach.  Send me a message and I ll be happy to send you the program and the contact person.
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 1/18/2004 10:50:00 PM Eastern Standard Time,
shantinik@... writes:
>>January 31 in Orlando; February 1 in Tampa; February 2 in Delray
Beach. Send me a message and I'll be happy to send you the program
and the contact person. In all three places I am doing "Don't Worry,
Be Happy: On the Curriculum of Happiness", and in two of them, "Beans
and the Curriculum of Creamed Corn" (also called "Education and
Everyday Life."<<
************************************
David, do you ever sell tapes of your speaking engagements? I am always
needing some inspiration in everyday life and ideas. I've about worn out my
Peaceful Parenting tape from Sandra! And I've not yet been able to get info on the
last unschooling conference tapes.

Nancy B. in WV


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Speaking in Florida
messages.msgSnippet: David, PLEASE say hello to Florida for me!! Especially Tampa LOL!!! We used to live about two hours north, in a little place called Homosassa Springs...We have
messages.messageBody:
David,

PLEASE say hello to Florida for me!! Especially Tampa LOL!!! We used to live about two hours north, in a little place called Homosassa Springs...We have really missed Florida, particularly the sunshine!! We're now on Cape Cod thanks to the Coast Guard...and planning to ask to go back to FL in 2005 so we can thaw out!!!

:-)

MamaBeth
http://everydaylives.blogspot.com



shantinik <shantinik@...> wrote:
I just wanted to let folks know that I'll be speaking in Florida at
the end of the month:

January 31 in Orlando; February 1 in Tampa; February 2 in Delray
Beach. Send me a message and I'll be happy to send you the program
and the contact person. In all three places I am doing "Don't Worry,
Be Happy: On the Curriculum of Happiness", and in two of them, "Beans
and the Curriculum of Creamed Corn" (also called "Education and
Everyday Life."

If you live in said subtropical place, that has a REAL sun (not like
the ersatz one we have here), I'll look forward to meeting you! (I
promise fun.)

David
www.skylarksings.com

messages.subject: Speaking in Florida
messages.msgSnippet: I just wanted to let folks know that I ll be speaking in Florida at the end of the month: January 31 in Orlando; February 1 in Tampa; February 2 in Delray
messages.messageBody:
I just wanted to let folks know that I'll be speaking in Florida at
the end of the month:

January 31 in Orlando; February 1 in Tampa; February 2 in Delray
Beach. Send me a message and I'll be happy to send you the program
and the contact person. In all three places I am doing "Don't Worry,
Be Happy: On the Curriculum of Happiness", and in two of them, "Beans
and the Curriculum of Creamed Corn" (also called "Education and
Everyday Life."

If you live in said subtropical place, that has a REAL sun (not like
the ersatz one we have here), I'll look forward to meeting you! (I
promise fun.)

David
www.skylarksings.com
